external_games.name: Age of Heroes II: Underground Horror

name: Age of Heroes II: Underground Horror
storyline: Once evil was already defeated, but a lot of time has passed since then. Fate of others is once again in the hands of hero: undead have awakened not only in human settlements, but also in the domains of underground dwellers. The dwarves are brave warriors, but their weapons are weak against magic of death, and only one who can help them is a necromancer named Ortega, a former court mage who now spends his time in a small hut on the mountainside.
summary: Strategy-RPG developed by Qplaze and published by RME for mobile phone, which released in 2006. It is a second game in Age of Heroes series.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Эпоха героев II: Ужас из подземелья (Age of Heroes 2) JAVA ИГРА (Qplaze 2006 год) ПОЛНОЕ ПРОХОЖДЕНИЕ
